thread.title: When Parineeti Chopra met Brian Lara in Hyderabad
thread.title_full: When Parineeti Chopra met Brian Lara in Hyderabad - newsR

author: newsr.in
title: When Parineeti Chopra met Brian Lara in Hyderabad
text:
Bollywood actress Parineeti Chopra is thrilled to have met West Indian batting legend Brian Lara at an event in Hyderabad .
The 26-year-old "Hasee Toh Phasee" actress took to Twitter to share two pictures with Lara, 46, and heaped praise on the former cricketer.
An honour to have met you !! You are such a humble human ... Â»
